title: Commode (France), mid-18th century
dimensions: without marble top: h: 81 x w: 124 x d: 63 cm (31 7/8 x 48 13/16 x 24 13/16 in.)
description: Bombé form with two large harizontal drawers in front, cabriole legs; overall, black lacquer surface decorated with Chinoiserie landscapes in front and on left and right sides; scrolling, foliate gilt bronze mounts on edges, feet, and surounding landscape scenes on front and sides; foliate, gilt bronze loop handles integrated into mounts at upper corners of top drawer, and lower corners of bottom drawer; a gilt bronze escutcheon surrounding keyhole at top center of each drawer.

tombstone.epitaph:
Commode (France), mid-18th century. Lacquer, wood, gilt bronze, marble (top). 
1977-116-1-a,b.
